摘要：该文描述了自四川西部发现的毛茛科乌头属一新种，泸定乌头。此种隶属乌头属乌头亚属。
关键词 毛茛科，乌头属，新种，四川
中图分类号：Q949 文献标识码：A
A new species of Aconitum (Ranunculaceae) from Sichuan

(State Key Laboratory of Systematic and Evolutionary Botany,Institute of Botany, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing 100093, China)   
Abstract: A species of the genus Aconitum (Ranunculaceae),A. ludingense, belonging to Sugben.   
Aconitum,is described as new from western Sichuan Province.   
Key words: Ranunculaceae,Aconitum, new species, Sichuan
Aconitum ludingense W. T. Wang, sp. nov. Fig. 1

Ob folia dissecta, flores interdum solitarios species nona haec est aliquantum similis $A$ monantho Nakai,a quo caulibus multo brevioribus $3 \mathrm { ~ m ~ }$ longis,foliorum basalium petiolis etiam multo brevioribus $0 . 9 \mathrm { - } 2 . 2 ~ \mathrm { c m }$ longis, sepalo supero galeoto-naviculari haud rostrato, gynoecio ex carpellis quinque dense sericeis constanti valde differt. In A. monantho,caules $1 4 { - } 3 0 ~ \mathrm { c m }$ longi, foliorum basalium petioli $5 ^ { - } 2 0 ~ \mathrm { c m }$ longi, sepalum superum alte galeatum et rostratum，et gynoecium ex carpellis tribus glabris constans est.

Small biennial herbs $3 { - } 5 \ \mathrm { c m }$ tall.Root tubers 2, small, ellipsoidal or conic, $7 { \cdot } 9 { \times } 3 ~ \mathrm { m m }$ .Stem very short, $3 ~ \mathrm { m m }$ long, $2 ~ \mathrm { m m }$ across,glabrous,near base $_ { 1 ^ { - } 2 }$ -leaved, apex with a short raceme. Basal leavesca. 4， glabrous；bladessubcoriaceous， cordate-pentagonal，orreniform, （204号 $0 . 4 { - } 1 . 2 { \times } 1 { - } 2 . 5 \ \mathrm { c m }$ ,3-parted to $0 . 5 { - } 1 ~ \mathrm { m m }$ above base,central lobe smaller, broad-rhombic, $0 . 4 \substack { - 0 . 7 }$ cm broad，3-lobed,with lobules linear-ovate entire or $_ { 1 ^ { - } 2 }$ -denticulate，lateral lobes larger, obliquely flabellate, $0 . 5 \mathrm { - } 1 . 7 ~ \mathrm { c m }$ broad,unequally 2-parted,with secondary lobules 2-3-lobed or 2-parted; petioles $0 . 9 - 2 . 2 \mathrm { c m }$ long. Cauline leaves similar to basal ones.Racemes terminal, $3 ^ { - 3 . 5 }$ （204号 cm long, $_ { 1 ^ { - 3 } }$ -flowered; bracts foliaceous,shortly petiolate; pedicels robust, $2 { - } 2 . 4 ~ \mathrm { c m }$ long,with dense spreading short hairs $0 . 1 \mathrm { - } 0 . 2 \ \mathrm { m m }$ long,below or above 2-bracteolate; bracteoles linear, $2 ^ { - 6 \times 0 . 4 - 1 } ~ \mathrm { { m m } }$ ，glabrous.Flower: Sepals blue,membranous,upper sepal $1 3 \ \mathrm { m m }$ long，apex galeate ca. $5 \mathrm { m m }$ broad, else-where navicular, ca. $3 \mathrm { m m }$ broad,adaxially glabrous,abaxially above with sparse hairs and ciliate; lateral sepals obliquely flabellate,ca. $1 0 { \times } 1 1 \ \mathrm { m m }$ ， apex slightly undulate,adaxially and abaxially on the middle with sparse short hairs; lower sepals broad-elliptic, ca. $6 \times 4 ~ \mathrm { m m }$ ,adaxially glabrous,abaxially near apex puberulous,apex rounded. Stamens ca. 30, glabrous; filaments white,lanceolate-linear, $3 . 5 { - } 5 { \times } 0 . 6 ~ \mathrm { m m }$ ; anthers black, ca. $0 . 8 \times 1 ~ \mathrm { m m }$ .Carpels 5； ovaries linear, $3 . 5 { - } 4 { \times } 0 . 8 ~ \ \mathrm { m m }$ ，densely sericeous； styles $0 . 8 \mathrm { - } 1 ~ \ \mathrm { m m }$ ，glabrous.Follicles narrow-oblong, narrow-oblong, $1 0 \times 3 { - } 4 \mathrm { m m }$ , with sparse hairs and transverse nerves.; persistent 图1 泸定乌头1.开花植株，其总状花序具1花；2.花；3．上萼片；4.侧萼片；5．下萼片；6．花 瓣；7．雄蕊；8．雌蕊群；9.瞢葵；10.种子。（据holotype，孙英宝绘图）

styles $2 \mathrm { m m }$ long. Seeds whitish, compressed-tetrahedral, ca. $2 \mathrm { m m }$ long.
四川(Sichuan)：泸定县，雅家梗山口 (Luding County, Yajiageng Pass),alt. $3 9 5 0 \mathrm { m }$ ，高山草甸(on alpine meadow)，2018-09-06，陈文俐，蒋善文，张中帅(W.L.Chen,S.W.Jiang&Z. S. Zhang) 912 (holotype, PE).

此种的叶细裂，花有时单生，因此与也具上述特征的高山乌头(A.monanthum Nakai)有些相似，与后者的区别在于此种的茎很短，仅长 $3 \mathrm { m m }$ ，基生叶叶柄也很短，长 $0 . 9 { \sim } 2 . 2 \ \mathrm { c m }$ ，上萼片盔状船形，不具喙，雌蕊群由5枚密被卷毛的心皮组成，而大不相同。在高山乌头，茎长 $1 4 { \sim } 3 0 ~ \mathrm { c m }$ ，基生叶叶柄长 $5 { \sim } 2 0 ~ \mathrm { c m }$ ，上萼片高盔形，具喙，雌蕊群由3枚无毛心皮组成。（王文采，1979）
